name: Airborne
desc: A creature knocked into the air and unable to defend themselves.
effect: An Airborne creature immediately loses their _Position_ and is _Restrained_. Additionally, while Airborne, they gain _Susceptible_ (_Forced Movement_).
repeat: If an Airborne creature would gain Airborne they instead extend the Airborne duration by a _Phase_.
remove: Creatures are Airborne until the end of the next _Phase_, they suffer _Forced Movement_, or they gain _Flight_. If the creature loses this Airborne by either of the first two means they _Fall_ I. Do not remove _Airborne_ until the creature's _Forced Movement_ is complete.

name: Entangled
desc: A creature that is entangled in some sort of material, whether that be vines, spider silk, or wires.
effect:
The effect of Entangled depends on the current amount the creature has relative to their _Size_:
* [Size-1]: The creature has _Disadvantage_ on _Attacks_ and _Reflex_ saves.
* [Size]: As Rank 1, but the creature is also _Slowed_.
* [Size+1]: The creature is _Restrained_.
remove: Creatures may clear Entangled by either _Recovering_ and making a _Grit_/_Reflex_ roll [_Negate_ 9] to reduce their Entangled by 1. Alternatively, a creature clears 1 Entangled for every 4 _Slash_ damage they take. A creature may choose to target just the Web when attacking.

name: Alight
desc: An elemental affliction caused by being set aflame.
effect: At the end of each _Phase_ an Alight creature takes 2 Damage [_Fire_, _AP_]. This Damage ignores _Block_.
special: While a creature has Alight they have _Resistance_ I (_Cold_).
repeat: If an Alight creature would gain Alight they instead take 2 [_Fire_, _AP_] Damage.
reacts: <ins>_Frozen_:</ins> If an Alight creature would gain _Frozen_ they instead remove Alight.
<ins>_Armored_:</ins>  If an Alight creature would gain _Armored_ they instead remove Alight.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may end their turn _Prone_ to remove Alight.

name: Bleeding
desc: An affliction caused by a generic wound that can cause ongoing damage.
effect: While a creature has Bleeding they lose _Stamina_ equal to their Bleeding value at the end of their _Turn_ and any _Turn_ they take a _Reaction_.
repeat: If a Bleeding creatures gains Bleeding, increase the value by 1.
remove: When a creature _Recovers_ they may _Negate_ with _Grit_ and reduce their _Bleed_ by half the result.

name: Blinded
desc: When a creature's eyesight is hindered, rendering them unable to effectively see.
effect: A Blinded creature sees all creatures within Range 3 as _Lightly Obscured_ and all creatures beyond that range as _Heavily Obscured_. Additionally, Attacks against a Blinded creature gain a +1 _Bonus_.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may remove Blinded.
repeat: If a Blinded creature would gain Blinded they instead extend the Blinded duration by 1 _Phase_.
remove: Creatures are Blinded until the end of the next _Phase_.

name: Joyful
desc: A mental affliction caused when a creature's heart is full of joy.
effect: While Joyful a creature gains +1 _Reflex_. While _Engaged_ with an allied creature a creature may remove Joyful at any time for 2 _Momentum_ or 1 _Movement_.
repeat: If a Joyful creature would gain Joyful they instead gain 1 _Momentum_.
reacts: <ins>_Anguished_:</ins> If a creature is _Anguished_ and would gain Joyful, they instead remove _Anguished_.

name: Courageous
desc: A mental affliction caused when a creature's heart is full of bravery.
effect: While Joyful a creature gains +1 _Grit_. While _Engaged_ with a hostile creature a creature may remove Courageous at any time to clear 5 _Block_ or to _Recover_.
repeat: If a Courageous creature would gain Courageous they instead gain 1 _Momentum_.
reacts: <ins>_Frightened_:</ins> If a creature is _Frightened_ and would gain Courageous, they instead remove _Frightened_.

name: Calm
desc: A mental affliction caused when a creature's mind is clear and avoiding violence.
effect: While Calm a creature gains +1 _Focus_. If a creature does not make an Attack on their _Turn_ they may remove _Calm_ to gain 3 _Momentum_.
repeat: If a Calm creature would gain Calm they gain 1 _Momentum_.
reacts: <ins>_Enraged_:</ins> If a creature is _Enraged_ and would gain Calm, they instead remove _Enraged_.

name: Disarm
desc: An effect where an item is wrenched away from a creature.
effect: An Item the Target has _Worn_ or _Wielded_ (chosen when this Status is inflicted) is immediately dropped unattended in the current _Arena_, or is _Wielded_ by the creature that inflict Disarm if they are within Range to use _Draw/Stow_ and they have a _Free Hand_.

name: Dazed
desc: An affliction caused when a creature's mind is muddled ad slow, compromising their defenses.
effect: The Target loses a total of X _Stamina_, where X is the value of Dazed. If a creature has 0 _Stamina_ any remaining Dazed is instead applied as _Block_.
special: Dazed is applied before a creature may Negate any other effects.

name: Taunted
desc: An affliction caused when a creature is single-mindedly focused on a foe.
effect: While a player character is Taunted all Attacks that do not target the creature that inflicted Taunted are made at _Disadvantage_. When any other creature is Taunted, they ignore their normal targeting for Attacks and instead may only target the creature that inflicted Taunt. Additionally, in either case, any _Movement_ that does not bring you closer to the creature that inflicted Taunted has its cost increased by 1.
repeat: If a Taunted creature would gain Taunted use the new Taunted inflictor as the target of this Status.
remove: If the creature that inflicted Taunted targets another creature with an Attack, you may immediately _Negate_ [_Focus_ 7] to clear Taunted.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may remove Taunted.

name: Engaged
desc: A status showing that two creatures are engaged in close combat with one another.
effect: While Engaged spending _Movement_ or using Abilities that cost _Movement_ (even if that cost is reduced to 0) creates an _Opening_. Additionally, while _Engaged_, a character has _Disadvantage_ all Attacks that do not include at least one creature they are _Engaged_ with.
remove: Characters may spend 1 _Movement_ to remove all instances of _Engaged_, as well as any _Terrain Bonus_ or _Hazard_.

name: Exposed
desc: An affliction caused when an opening in a creature's defenses has been forced open.
effect: The next Attack against an Exposed creature has _Advantage_. After being attacked remove Exposed.
repeat: If an Exposed creature would gain Exposed they instead gain 1 _Stun_.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may remove Exposed.

name: Grabbed
desc: A status caused when creatures are locked in close combat and clinging to one another.
effect: When you inflict Grabbed, check the size of both the attacker and defender. If the defender is larger, inflict _Ridden_. If the defender is the same size or smaller, inflict _Grappled_.

name: Ridden
desc: A creature is clinging to you, traveling with you as an unwanted passenger.
effect:
While you are Ridden, the creature that inflicted it on you is always _Engaged_ with you and moves with you. Additionally, you have _Disadvantage_ to attack or _Parry_ any creature riding you and cannot _Dodge_ their Attacks, but creatures riding you may not react to _Openings_ created by you spending _Movement_. Finally, depending on the total Size of creatures riding you, take the following penalties:
* If the total Size riding you is greater than your Size, you are _Immobilized_.
* If the total Size riding you is your Size - 1 or your Size, you are instead _Hobbled_.
repeat: If a Ridden creature would gain Ridden, the other creature also begins to ride them. If inflicted from a creature already riding you, instead gain _Vulnerable_ 1.
remove: On their Turn, creatures may spend 1 _Momentum_ to make a _Grit_ roll opposed by their rider's _Grit_/_Reflex_. If you win, remove Ridden. A creature may do this once per Turn per rider.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may attempt to remove Ridden at no cost, and have _Advantage_ on the opposed _Negate_.

name: Grappled
desc: A creature is grasping you, limiting your mobility greatly.
effect: While you are Grappled you are _Immobilized_, the creature that inflicted it on you is always _Engaged_ with you, and you Move with them. When a creature Grappling you spends _Movement_ you may not react to the _Opening_ it creates. Additionally, your _Defense Rolls_ against them have _Disadvantage_. Finally, if you are within one Size of the grappler, they are _Hobbled_.
repeat: If a Grappled creature would gain Grappled, the other creature also begins to grapple them. If inflicted from a creature already grappling you, they may instead inflict _Steal_ or _Prone_.
remove: On their Turn, creatures may spend 1 _Momentum_ to make a _Grit_/_Reflex_ roll opposed by their grappler's _Grit_. If you win, remove Grappled. A creature may do this once per Turn per grappler. Alternatively, if a creature is the same size as their grappler, they can make an opposed _Grit_ role to instead become the grappler.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may attempt to remove Grappled at no cost, and have _Advantage_ on the opposed _Negate_.

name: Hobbled
desc: An affliction caused when a creature's movement is impaired somehow.
effect: While Hobbled all Movement costs are increased by 1.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may remove Hobbled.

name: Impaired
desc: An affliction caused when a creature's ability to attack is limited.
effect: The next Attack by an Impaired creature has _Disadvantage_. After this impacts an Attack remove Impaired.
repeat: If an Impaired creature would gain Impaired they instead gain 1 _Stun_.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may remove Impaired.

name: Immobilized
desc: Your movement is restricted to the degree that you may not move.
effect: While Immobilized a creature may not spend _Movement_ except to remove a _Status Effect_ causing this condition.

name: Poisoned
desc: An affliction caused by toxins ravaging you from the inside out.
effect: While a creature is Poisoned they take _Damage_ equal to their Poisoned value at the start of their _Turn_. A creature may reduce this Damage by their _Grit_, instead taking that portion as _Stun_.
remove: Poisoned is only removed by effects that explicitly remove it.

name: Prone
desc: An effect caused when a foe is knocked flat on their back.
effect: A Prone creature is _Immobilized_. While Prone, Melee attacks against the target gain Advantage, but Medium and Long Range attacks have Disadvantage.
remove: A creature may expend one Movement to end Prone. This creates an _Opening_.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may expend one Movement to remove _Prone_ without creating an _Opening_.

name: Pull
desc: You drag a foe closer to you or.
effect:
When you inflict Pull a numeric value will be present. You may inflict a combination of the below effects equal to said value:
* Choose one: 
	* Pull 1:  Place the Target at your _Position_ if they are within your _Arena_, or place them in any _Position_ within their _Arena_ if they are not in your _Arena_.
	* Pull 2:  Place them in any _Position_ in an _Arena_ adjacent to them that places them closer to you. Inflict _Block_ equal to any additional _Movement_ cost to enter said _Arena_.
* Pull X: Cause the _Target_ to _Collide_ X with a _Feature_ at their final _Position_. You may repeat this option.

name: Push
desc: You launch a creature away from you, creating space and sending them away.
effect: When you inflict Push, force the target to stop _Occupying_ their current _Terrain_ and leave their current _Engagement_. You may then force them to enter a new _Engagement_ or _Occupy_ _Terrain_ of your choice within their current _Arena_, so long as it does not make them _Engaged_ with you. If it was a Forceful Push, you may instead move them to an adjacent _Arena_, so long as this moves them to an _Arena_ further from you

name: Slide
desc: You adroitly move a foe about, placing them where you wish.
effect:
When you inflict Slide a numeric value will be present. You may inflict a combination of the below effects equal to said value:
* Choose one: 
	* Slide 1: You may force the target to stop _Occupying_ their current _Terrain_ and/or place the Target in any other _Engagement_ within their _Arena_.
	* Slide 2: Place them in any _Arena_ adjacent to their current one. Inflict _Block_ equal to any additional _Movement_ cost to enter said _Arena_.
* Slide X: Cause the _Target_ to _Collide_ X with a _Feature_ at their final _Position_.

name: Reeling
desc: An affliction caused when a creature cannot maintain their block.
effect: While a creature has Reeling increase the cost of all _Defensive_ _Reactions_ by 1.
repeat: If a Reeling creature would gain Reeling they instead gain 1 _Block_.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may remove Reeling.

name: Restrained
desc: An effect cause when a creature's ability to move is severely hampered.
effect: A Restrained creature's ability to move is severely hampered. While Restrained, a creature cannot Move, makes all Attacks with _Disadvantage_, and all Attacks against them have _Advantage_.
remove: How to end Restrained is typically specified in the ability that inflicts it.
repeat: If a Restrained creature would gain Restrained they remain Restrained, but must fulfill all Restrained removal constraints to end the condition.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may remove Restrained if no other removal method is listed.

name: Studied
desc: An affliction caused when one creature gains knowledge on another.
effect:
Creatures may remove a hostile creature's _Studied_ for one of the following effects:
* Clear _Studied_ at any time to learn the target's current and maximum _Stamina_ and _Block_, their _Defenses_, and any _Weaknesses_/_Resistances_/_Immunities_ they have.
* When making an Attack or Defend Roll targeting or in response to the Target you may clear Studied to increase the result of a single die roll by 1.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may remove _Studied_.

name: Sundered
effect: When a creature gains _Sundered_ a piece of _Worn_ or _Wielded_ _Equipment_ loses 1 _Durability_, chosen by the Attacker. If a creature has no remaining _Equipment_ that can be _Damaged_ they instead gain _Vulnerable_ 1.

name: Suppressed
desc: A condition caused when your connection to your spirit is limited.
effect: While Suppressed all [_Spirit_] abilities cost an additional 2 _Momentum_ to use.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may remove _Suppressed_.
repeat: If a Suppressed or _Sealed_ creature would gain Suppressed they instead gain 2 _Block_.

name: Sealed
desc: A condition caused when your connection to your spirit is severed.
effect: While Sealed [_Spirit_] Abilities may not be utilized.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may remove _Sealed_ and gain _Suppressed_.
repeat: If a Sealed creature would gain Sealed they instead gain 4 _Block_. If a _Suppressed_ creature gains Sealed, remove _Suppressed_ and inflict 2 _Block_.

name: Vulnerable
desc: A status that represents an erasure of a character's ability to successfully defend themselves.
effect: Creatures take additional Damage equal to their _Vulnerable_ value.
recover: When a creature _Recovers_ they may remove 2 Vulnerable.

name: Concentrating
desc: A creature that has a singular focus, granting them an enhanced ability to act.
effect: A creature may remove Concentrating to gain _Advantage_ on any Roll.
